article: Cars are an important part of life in the United States. Without a car, most people feel that they are _ .And even if a person is poor, he doesn't feel _ poor when he has a car. Henry Ford was the man who first started _ cars in large numbers. He probably didn't know how much the car was going to _ American culture.The car made the United States a nation on wheels . And it _ to make the United States what it is today. There are three main reasons that the car has become so _ in the United States. First of all ,the country is a huge one and Americans like to _ around in it .The car _ the most comfortable and cheapest form of transportation. With a car, people can go any place _ spending a lot of money.The second reason is that the United States never really developed an efficient and inexpensive form of public _ . Long distance trains have never been as _ in the United States as they are in other parts of the world.Nowadays there is a good system of air-service provided by _ .But it is too expensive to be used _ . The third reason is the most _ one.The American spirit of _ is what really made cars popular. Americans don't like to wait for a bus or a train or even a plane. They don't like to have to _ an exact schedule. A car gives them the freedom to schedule their own time.And this is the freedom that Americans want _ to have.
